About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me.

BIO

My name is Olalekan Efunkunle. I am a Javascript developer and 5th year Dental Student. Love learning new things and meeting new people. Currently based in Ibadan, Nigeria. I like dancing, taking random photographs and making friends.

UADS

Vice-President at the Unibadan Association of Dental Students.Before my current office, I was the deputy-senate chairman of the Legislative arm of the association and also a 3 time senator, majority leader once.

Panacea Project

Co-founder and administrator of public policy at the Panacea Project, a NGO focused on tackling the millenium development goals by enabling children and youths. I am also the Immediate Past Director of Social Outreach. I oversaw at least 2 major outreaches and managed volunteers at the outreachs.

Freelance Fullstack Javascript Developer

Freelance Junior Javscript Developer, open to job offers. I am more than comfortable with React/Redux, NextJs, Firebase, Various APIs including Stripe and Paystack. A team player that is also ready to learn
